resources.string:
Hi, my name is Anunoy but I usually go by Siddu. 

I am a graduate student at Georgia Institute of Technology majoring in Computer Science. 
Within Computer Science, I specialize in Computer Science and Human-Computer Interaction. 

I started learning how to make Android apps in Kotlin for my 2021 Summer Internship. 

A fun fact about me is I can sing the alphabet backwards. 

Some of my hobbies include playing board games with friends and playing video games on the Wii and Nintendo DS. 

My favorite board game is Catan and my favorite game is Pok√©mon Platinum on the Nintendo DS.
